### Summary

A clear, concise description of what is going wrong in HeaderCheck.

### URL or site affected

If this happens on a specific site, include the URL here.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open HeaderCheck on...
2. Click or select...
3. Look at...
4. See the issue...

### What you expected to see

Describe what you thought HeaderCheck would show or do.

### What you actually saw

Describe what HeaderCheck did instead  
(for example, wrong grade, headers missing, status colors not matching, errors in the popup).

### Screenshots or recordings

If possible, add a screenshot or short screen recording of the HeaderCheck popup and the page you are testing.

### Environment

- HeaderCheck version: (from the footer in the popup or the extension details page)
- Install source: [Chrome Web Store or local dev build]
- Browser: [for example, Chrome 128]
- OS: [for example, macOS 15 or Windows 11]

### Extra details

If you can, include any of the following:

- Example response headers from DevTools  
- Any errors shown in the browser console  
- Whether this happens on one site or many
